Description: Handle sliver of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora at neck join to sharpish turn. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 122, 17? Name Thesmokritos. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, MGR 154.46.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0810)
